text: The 1999 Rose City Grand Prix was the fifth round of the 1999 American Le Mans Series season. Manthey Racing and their drivers were penalized by not winning championship points in this round. ==Statistics== * Pole position - #42 BMW Motorsport - 1:04.387 * Fastest lap - #42 BMW Motorsport - 1:05.451 * Distance - * Average speed - ==References== * * Rose City Category:Portland Grand Prix Rose City Grand Prix Category:1999 in Portland, Oregon Category:August 1999 sports events in the United States
